Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Nadia
Reviews.Content: It's slim, lightweight, and easy to use.  Windows 8 takes a bit to get used to but overall a great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love my Gateway!
Reviews.Author: Patty "Patty"
Reviews.Content: I have had a lot of computers over the years, and two of those being a Gateway desktop.  I've never had a Gateway laptop, but I sure do love having one now.  It's a little workhorse!  Crystal clear images, loads fast, and is so easy to set up.  It didn't take me long to figure out Windows 8, and although I like WIndows  7 better, this is pretty easy to use. Everything is right on your desktop and you can remove what you don't want on it and choose what you do want on it.Very happy with this computer!

Reviews.Title: Cheap yet good quality
Reviews.Author: Pau Lu
Reviews.Content: I've had this laptop for about 3 months now and it's been running smooth.  Decent gaming laptop just don't expect to play any games past 2006 or something like that.  Love the layout of the keyboard and the keys to change brightness and most amazing the key to access social networks which I think is an amazing idea.  The webcam is also good and comes along with its own built in mic which I thought was cool.  The only complaint I can have about it is that it has Windows 8 on it.  Theres really no point in buying a laptop w/ Windows 8 unless its a touchscreen.  However, its bearable.So if you want to buy a pretty good laptop without breaking the bank, go for this!  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop -- Same Gateway quality.
Reviews.Author: John Wilson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my fiancé and I... We both have used it on and off, along with my gateway PC. The laptop is pretty lightweight. Just the right, weight. If you can work Windows 8 and are used to it. This laptop's price is very fair for the specs. It runs quick enough, maybe not the fastest. But that is easily fixed with a cheap upgrade. All-purpose laptop for us. Some gaming, E-Mail, Browsing. It loads everything proper enough. I'd buy another one for sure. I intend to add more memory. Other than that. 4 stars. Satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Lags on screensaver!
Reviews.Author: Andoria "Newfie owner"
Reviews.Content: You can't even watch a YouTube video without it skipping and the speakers crackle.  This computer is laughably bad and I'm returning it.

Reviews.Title: Gateway NE51B16u
Reviews.Author: annie mcglorthon
Reviews.Content: the laptop is okay.  It might be better if windows' 8 was not on it.  The screen is not user friendly.  and the loaptop itself is very slow.

Reviews.Title: My laptop
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Stuck
Reviews.Content: This is my personal laptop, I'm a full time student so it writes alot of papers. Runs great, I have had very minimal problems with it (any problem I have encountered has been fixed by turning the laptop on and off). this is definatley not a gamers PC, but I play sims on here and it works just fine. I love window 8 just for the ease of access to everything! Plus at only $300? This computer is awesome. Totally reccomend it.

Reviews.Title: Moneys Worth
Reviews.Author: Harold Anderson
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these, one for a frien and one for my doughter. Good for Basic use and the price is worth it

Reviews.Title: So Slow
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Quertinmont
Reviews.Content: This computer was so horrible.  As someone else mentioned the keyboard is really bad.  They tried to fit a large keyboard into a laptop and it's just awkward.Windows 8 is horrible.  It was so slow and unresponsive.I would not recommend buying this computer.

Reviews.Title: Works well for what I wanted it for
Reviews.Author: Jake Beckman
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop to run exactly 1 piece of software and I have no intention of using it for anything but this one program so I cannot really say how functional it is beyond this, It is my first experience with Windows 8, the tiles are not terribly functional on a device of this type, I think they must be for something with a touch screen.  The laptop arrived timely and as described.  The set up was straightforward, and I had my lone bit of software up and running in hours.  It is still perking along. It was a very good deal and I have no complaints at this time.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Laptop
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop for myself a few days ago and am very pleased with it's performance.I like that it's light weight and is easy to use once you get accustomed to windows 8.This laptop works well for gaming as well and for the price it's a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Fine laptop
Reviews.Author: Nellie
Reviews.Content: My son's present and was easy to set up and for the cost and as a replacement laptop it works just fine.
